metadata.title: CVE-2020-10177 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.description:
Pillow before 7.1.0 has multiple out-of-bounds reads in libImaging/FliDecode.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-10177` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-pil - 7.2.0-1
python3-pil.imagetk - 7.2.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pillow package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.2.0-1').
